name: @shaisrc/tty
description: A minimalist, high-performance ASCII rendering library for game developers with TypeScript support, featuring double-buffering, layers, camera system, and complete input handling

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs && npm run build:examples && vitepress build docs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run build
scripts.version:beta: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const match = pkg.version.match(/^(.+)-beta\.(\d+)$/); if (match) { pkg.version = match[1] + '-beta.' + (parseInt(match[2]) + 1); } else { pkg.version = pkg.version.split('-')[0] + '-beta.0'; } require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2) + '\n');"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run version:beta && node -e "if(process.env.NPM_TOKEN){require('fs').writeFileSync('.npmrc','//registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken='+process.env.NPM_TOKEN)}" && npm publish --tag beta --access public && node -e "if(process.env.NPM_TOKEN){try{require('fs').unlinkSync('.npmrc')}catch(e){}}"

author: Shai (https://github.com/shaisrc)
